title: Grade 10 Mathematics Test: Quadratic Equations

questions.question: Which of the following is a quadratic equation?
The discriminant of a quadratic equation is b^2 - 4ac. If the discriminant is positive, the equation has:
Find the sum and product of the roots of the quadratic equation 2x^2 + 4x - 6 = 0.
Which method can be used to solve quadratic equations?

answer_key:
1. b) x^2 - 3x + 2 = 0
2. x = 2, x = 3
3. a) Two distinct real roots
4. Sum = -2, Product = -3
5. d) All of the above
instructions: Read each question carefully and answer to the best of your ability. Show your working where appropriate. The time limit is 30 minutes. Good luck!
